train module¶

Training module for VAE models.

Contains the training loop with evaluation performed at each epoch.

train.train_model(model: Module, train_loader: DataLoader, test_loader: DataLoader, num_epochs: int, device: device = device(type='cuda'), progress_bar=None, status_text=None, loss_placeholder=None, images_placeholder=None) → Tuple[Module, Dict[str, List[float]]]¶

Train the VAE model with Streamlit visualization.

Parameters:

  • model (nn.Module) – The VAE model to train.

  • train_loader (DataLoader) – DataLoader for the training set.

  • test_loader (DataLoader) – DataLoader for the test set.

  • num_epochs (int) – Number of epochs to train for.

  • device (torch.device, optional) – Device to run the training on, by default CUDA if available, else CPU.

  • progress_bar (st.empty, optional) – Streamlit progress bar.

  • status_text (st.empty, optional) – Streamlit text element to show status.

  • loss_placeholder (st.empty, optional) – Streamlit placeholder for loss plot.

  • images_placeholder (st.empty, optional) – Streamlit placeholder for image reconstructions.

Returns:

A tuple containing: - trained model - dictionary of training and test losses

Return type:

Tuple[nn.Module, Dict[str, List[float]]]

Variational Autoencoders
